articles.description: Stand-in captain Ollie Pope says England’s hard-fought win over Sri Lanka shows they are not a "one-dimensional" team.
articles.title: Ollie Pope says Old Trafford win shows England are not 'one-dimensional'

articles.description: Arsenal keeper David Raya's brilliance allows Mikel Arteta's side to make a powerful early title statement, writes Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Arsenal put down title marker with victory at Aston Villa

articles.description: Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola believes Erling Haaland is feeling better than in previous seasons after having a proper summer break, following his hat-trick against Ipswich.
articles.title: Manchester City's Erling Haaland fresh and doing 'ridiculous' numbers - Pep Guardiola

articles.description: Brighton boss Fabian Hurzeler says he is emotional but not euphoric after beating Manchester United, as he tries to stay grounded.
articles.title: Brighton 2-1 Man Utd: Fabian Hurzeler 'emotional' after victory

articles.description: Everton manager Sean Dyche urges fans to recognise the struggle of managing a club that has "no money" and has sold some of their best players.
articles.title: Tottenham 4-0 Everton: Sean Dyche 'under pressure' but Toffees have 'no money'

articles.description: Emma Raducanu says she will always do things "a little bit differently" as she prepares for just her second US Open match since winning the title as a teenage qualifier in 2021.
articles.title: Emma Raducanu: US Open awaits as Briton continues to do things 'a little bit differently'

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Barcelona vs Athletic Club in the Primera División
articles.title: Barcelona vs Athletic Club: Primera División - BBC Sport

articles.description: Novak Djokovic calls for "clear protocols" and "standardised approaches" to tennis doping cases with Jannik Sinner having escaped a ban after testing positive for a banned substance.
articles.title: Jannik Sinner: Novak Djokovic wants 'clear protocols' over doping cases

articles.description: Lando Norris becomes the first person to beat Max Verstappen to pole position at the Dutch Grand Prix with a stunning lap in his McLaren.
articles.title: Lando Norris beats Verstappen to Dutch GP pole position

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Tottenham Hotspur vs Everton in the Premier League
articles.title: Tottenham Hotspur vs Everton: Premier League - BBC Sport
